content: We need this solution or something like it. Maybe a judge being apolitical is just a “sheen” or “illusion”, but it’s a crucial one. In my state judges cannot belong to discriminatory organizations (except religious ones); being barred from joining an anti-LGBT club doesn’t “make” a judge less anti-gay (the real problem is that he WANTS to join), but it conveys how seriously the judiciary as a whole takes discrimination, it gives confidence to a gay litigant or defendant, and maybe it even gives pause to a judge who inwardly harbors such biases.
